chunk-c0adf19ffbaf04196fe0e7bb8138b451.entity_name: The Escape of the Brazilian Boa Constrictor
chunk-c0adf19ffbaf04196fe0e7bb8138b451.description: The escape of the Brazilian boa constrictor led to Harry's longest-ever punishment, presumably taking the blame.
source_entities: THE ESCAPE OF THE BRAZILIAN BOA CONSTRICTOR

chunk-670f50a7825cbea8a84f18d0780244eb.description: The main character who receives a mysterious letter and is a student at Stonewall High, also addressed as Mr. H. Potter in the letter.

chunk-b128f9eabcb2e9a028c0f55f4b3f938b.description: The Letters to Harry Potter is the event where numerous letters addressed in green ink are sent to Harry, causing Vernon Dursley to take drastic measures to prevent their delivery, such as tearing them up, boarding up the mail slot, and fleeing from home.

chunk-89a2c197892ff7499329a7d68a1e15c7.description: Voldemort, also known as You-Know-Who, is a powerful dark wizard who killed Harry's parents and tried to kill Harry but failed, marking a significant event in the wizarding world.

chunk-a70c5caca846bf8cbc4fe9b74da6313b.description: Albus Dumbledore is the highly respected headmaster of Hogwarts, considered one of the greatest wizards, who allowed Hagrid to stay on as gamekeeper after his expulsion.
